page.title: 14THE ROLE OF THE CHURCH.
page.content: There has probably been a church in {Puddletown}since Saxon times.The present parish church of{St.Mary,The {Virgin}dates from the 13th century.It is an impressives building,both inside and out,with a fine tower.The{parish} includes{Puddletown}itself,{Tolpuddle} (2\ miles east)and the immediate surrouding area. In an interview the local vicar, Dr. Hancock explained his role in the area.He is still responible for the 'cure of souls',the spiritual health of the people.He must encourage the Christian faith and bring the knowledge of Christ to those unaware of it.The vicar has an important part to play in the pastoral care of the villagers and this includes an active participation in the welfare of the schools and other youth activities.
